isis.stitle: Spanish - Guía para Localización de Fallas del Sistema Eléctrico - 3200, 4200, 4300, 4400, 7300, 7400, 7500, 8500, 8600 - ANTILOCK AIR BRAKE SYSTEM WITH TRACTION CONTROL: BENDIX - 9200, 9300 and 9400 - OPERATION - EXCITER RING

svcproc.title: EXCITER RING
svcproc.para: The exciter ring is machined to close tolerances and has 100 equally spaced teeth ( Figure 3). The ring is heated and then installed onto the wheel assembly. Then as the exciter ring cools, it shrinks on the mating surface of the wheel hub. As the wheel rotates, the 100 teeth pass the sensor, each breaking the magnetic field creating the AC signal. One hundred cycles or pulses of the signal would indicate one revolution of the wheel. The signal is transmitted from the sensor to the controller.
